name: Desktop PC Alpha
shortDescription: Powerful desktop PC for office and gaming.
longDescription: Desktop PC Alpha comes with Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD and NVIDIA GTX 1660 for high performance computing and gaming.

name: Desktop PC Beta
shortDescription: Affordable desktop for home and office use.
longDescription: Desktop PC Beta features Intel i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, ideal for productivity and light gaming.

name: Desktop PC Gamma
longDescription: Desktop PC Gamma equipped with Intel i9, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, NVIDIA RTX 3070, perfect for demanding tasks and gaming.

name: Desktop PC Delta
longDescription: Desktop PC Delta has AMD Ryzen 7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, suitable for work and casual gaming.

name: Desktop PC Epsilon
longDescription: Desktop PC Epsilon includes Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, NVIDIA RTX 3060, great for gaming and multimedia.

name: Laptop Air X
shortDescription: Slim and lightweight laptop for daily use.
longDescription: Laptop Air X comes with Intel i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, perfect for students and office work.

name: Laptop Pro Y
longDescription: Laptop Pro Y equipped with Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, suitable for designers and developers.

name: Gaming Laptop Z
longDescription: Gaming Laptop Z includes NVIDIA RTX 3060, Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, excellent for gaming and streaming.

name: Laptop Slim Q
shortDescription: Compact laptop for travel and work.
longDescription: Laptop Slim Q features AMD Ryzen 5, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, lightweight and durable for travel.

name: Laptop Ultra P
shortDescription: Powerful ultrabook with long battery life.
longDescription: Laptop Ultra P equipped with Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, thin design and battery up to 12 hours.
